name: Herbert Park Hotel and Park Residence

reviews.text:
My first time staying at the Herbert Park was very pleasant. The staff are friendly and helpful. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable and the location is right in the center of Ballsbridge.
On the downside, it's a little more expensive than other hotels in this category.

We stayed in this beautiful hotel and our room was upgraded, which was a lovely surprise. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. I would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel. We will definitely stay here again. The room was spacious and displayed an amazing view of the park below. Thank you, we will definitely be returning.

Fantastic menu and friendly, efficient service.
The Caesar Salad, seafood chowder and open brown bread and prawn sandwich are top class.
Cappuccino served with a delicious sliver of chocolate cake‚Ä¶
Spotlessly clean hotel and relaxing lounge area where a single person can feel at ease.
Compared to other 4 star hotels in the Dublin area, this is the one I regularly return to and recommend!
Always parking available at the hotel itself or nearby Herbert Park.
üëèüéâü¶ã

Nice big room, however the water from the bathtub and shower were very dirty.

There was some brown material gushing out every few seconds, see effect of this in picture attached.

I asked for the night manager over the phone but no one came. When I showed the image to the staff at reception the following morning, they said that the water has been tested and deemed safe.

Really not acceptable to not be able to shower staying at a 4 star hotel!

One of the finest hotels I have stayed at. Spacious and well appointed rooms with adequate lighting. The breakfast is amazing in terms of variety and quality. The staff are very obliging and are knowledgeable about allergens. They even have gluten free bread and toast! Excellent service is provided by all, especially Julio and Gokhan, some of the staff at breakfast. At dinner I wish to acknowledge Vitaly and Julio for making it memorable. This place is a great value for money and I would certainly return here in a heartbeat.
